article_title: Biden and Netanyahu speak as Israel mulls Iran response
sentence: In  the  small  Israeli  town  of  Kiryat  Shmona,  a  couple  out  walking  their  dog  were  killed  by  Hezbollah  rockets  fired  from  Lebanon.

article_title: Biden and Netanyahu speak as Israel mulls Iran response
sentence: They  are  the  first  Israeli  civilians  to  die  since  the  cross-border  conflict  dramatically  escalated  12  days  ago.
